author: kpreisser
msg: - Use "100" as maximum number of players instead of "2" that was for debug purposes only.
- If a player couldn't enter the room, close the connection.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Anahita Goljahani for Fixed mispelling of "occurred" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5342
jleroux: this includes a safe change in jquery.validate.js and jquery.validate.min.js

author: dkulp
msg: Update to the latest http async stuff (SNAPSHOT for now, release should be very shortly) to help test it.

author: dkulp
msg: In some cases, setting the context of the bus could cause another listener to ask for the bus causeing a second bus to be created.   Make sure the current one is registered BEFORE calling the setContext
